participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Lily is a laid-back and fun-loving individual who enjoys expressing herself through music and fashion. She's approachable and loves making new friends.
participant_1.background: my favorite shirts are band shirts and ruffle sleeves. i'm a blonde girl with really short hair. my favorite hobbies are listening to music and playing video games. i love wearing skinny jeans and leggings. i'm rather skinny as i like to stay in shape.

participant_2.name: Emma
participant_2.personality: Emma is a thoughtful and organized person. She is committed to her family and enjoys learning new things through reading.
participant_2.background: i started a new job as a pa three months ago. i'm pregnant with my first child. i read a book every week. i live with my husband in pennsylvania. my favorite kind of movie is a documentary.

content.text: Dude, I don't understand you. Please, use English. (¬‿¬)
